name: Ixmail
body:
Install with nuget on visual studio :
# PM> Install-Package IxMail 

after installation
![](http://oi59.tinypic.com/2czsx06.jpg)

how to use it
![](http://oi61.tinypic.com/ieo47p.jpg)


you can add you custom tamplate in folder **IxMail** tamplate html, cshtml or txt
if got any error you can look in hidden folder **IxMail**

thank you
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
